title: [Champion Concept] THE PRINCE OF ICE - LUPAN
body:
**CLEAN'S PROJECT: 152**
Mail: chuyo2522@gmail.com (VietNam)

***INTRODUCING THE NEW CHAMPION & NEW MAP MODE IN GAME.**

**1. THE PRINCE OF ICE 
**
**2. MAP MODE GAME: " GRAY SNOW AREA " OF MOUNTAIN THE TARGON
**

Description Details

**1. THE PRINCE OF ICE - Lupan**

***Story: **
The boy brought in the power of cold and the resilient will of the last white dynasty in the legend.
The boy had to suffer the curse to become a snow fox for centuries.
And now, Lupan freed from the curse of Winter Witch cruel to set foot in the Arena of Justice.

***P : BREATHING FREEZE**
Lupine's breath was so cold that it formed a cold zone.
In a period of time, an ice pile falls into a random location around the cold zone. Damage to enemies if hit by ice pile
Lupan can pick up ice piles to slightly increase the advantage.
(Look Like – Blitzcrank – skill R : Static Field (passive) ){{champion:53}} 

***Q : KICKS FROST**
Activate
In a short time, the first three attacks - kick his foot on the enemy, very high increases attack speed and deals additional damage.
(Look Like – Rek'Sai – skill Q : Queen’s Wrathe (Un-Burrowed)){{champion:421}} 

***W : ROLL ROUND THE ICY BODY**
He surfs to an average distance to attack, creates a layer of shield momentarily.
If hit on an enemy, slow down and reduce the cooldown time by half.
(Look Like – Riven – skill E : Valor (Activate)) {{champion:92}} 

***E : THE WILL OF THE FROST**
Lupan use the power of the icy arm created four big pile of ice.
Use the hand to throw ice pile on the enemy.
They fly up behind the boy.
Lupan is strong range attack for four normal attacks (corresponding to four ice pile). Broken ice pile to spreading damage.
Lupan can pick up an ice pile from Passive of the boy (*P : BREATHING FREEZE) to increase an ice pile.
During activation of the E skill, it is possible to activate the Q skill to increase movement speed instead of attack speed.
(Look Like – Lissandra – skill Q : Ice Shard (Activate)) {{champion:127}} 

***R : SNOW EXPLOSION**
Lupan focus arm strength from two wind blows out a powerful frost. (fan-shaped)
Slowing down opponents in the area affected by the two icy winds.
Two extreme cold winds intersect at one point causing snow boom.
If the enemy in the snow boom area, the enemy is bounce up high and get high damage.
(Look Like – Galio – skill Q : Winds of War (Activate)) {{champion:3}} 

To be continued... Mountain Targon.{{champion:44}} 
Thanks for watching !
